control_attributes.control_description: The information system off-loads audit records [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] onto a different system or media than the system being audited.
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system identifies a secondary authoritative time source that is located in a different geographic region than the primary authoritative time source.

Control Statement: The information system off-loads audit records [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] onto a different system or media than the system being audited.
